subject: Need understanding on J2EE uniting?
msgSnippet: My manager would like some unit tests wrote for a J2EE app. These are in my opinion ad hoc test. But so be it. The application runs in WebSphere with a
messageBody:
My manager would like some unit tests wrote for a J2EE app. These are
in my opinion ad hoc test. But so be it.

The application runs in WebSphere with a Oracle9i backend and connects
to MQ Series for internal/external queuing. It polls a database table
that a Legacy application populates and there are no api for this app.

My questions are should I mock the inserts to the legacy app database?
And use cactus from this point on to test the app? And how do I test
the internal/external queuing?

I hope this is the right place for these questions.

brolamar
